rows.label: qst640403_msg0001
rows.name:
Those girls seem distraught...
Has something happened?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0002
rows.name: They do look a bit worried there...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0101
rows.name: Very good. Let us inquire!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0102
rows.name:
Rinne... Didn't we come here for the
springs?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0103
rows.name:
Egad! We could never fully enjoy our
time in the baths, knowing beautiful
girls were troubled just outside!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0104
rows.name:
I did expect that from Rinne...
Anyway, I happen to agree.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0105
rows.name: Can't just leave a person unhappy!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0106
rows.name:
My ladies! You seem troubled!
We implore you, please confide
in us with everything at all!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0107
rows.name: Who... Who are you...?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0108
rows.name:
Oh, we're just some kindly Blades
passing by with their Drivers.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0109
rows.name:
...Are you sure we should be talking
to someone in a floating bathtub...?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0110
rows.name: I'm...not sure. That's a fair point...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0111
rows.name:
But if person always in bathtub,
then very probably is pro at thing
like that, maybe?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0112
rows.name: VERY good counterpoint...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0113
rows.name: Hahah, oh dear...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0114
rows.name: ...Just go on and confide.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0115
rows.name:
Uhm... Okay.
It's our fathers. They've not come back
from the Geothermal Mining Plant.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0116
rows.name:
The townsfolk have been saying the
water in the bathhouse was all weird,
so our dads went to check the plant...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0117
rows.name: That does sound worrysome...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0118
rows.name:
So you're saying the hot springs are
out of order right now?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0119
rows.name:
Well, no, you can still get in, but...
They're not as nice as usual...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0120
rows.name:
Ololo and friends wanted to go see
dadapons but road is hard and full of
danger...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0121
rows.name:
They talk like urchins, these girls, but...
Oh, the nobility in their hearts!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0122
rows.name: We are nigh on moved to tears!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0123
rows.name:
Worry not, fair maidens! We and our
Driver shall strive to resolve this.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0124
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0125
rows.name:
We'll spare no expense, so long as
the result is a top-grade bathing
experience.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0126
rows.name:
In that case, Ololo definitely count
on help of friends!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0127
rows.name:
Like we said, our fathers all work at the
Geothermal Mining Plant...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0128
rows.name:
If you go by entrance, one of dadapons
should be there.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0129
rows.name:
All right. You girls wait here, then.
We'll do our darndest to make sure
this story has a happy ending!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0130
rows.name:
I'm a teeny-tiny bit afraid you
might have just jinxed it, Kasane...

rows.label: qst640403_msg0201
rows.name: Zakuro, you must go speak to the girls.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0202
rows.name:
Whaaat...? I thought we were here for
the hot springs!

rows.label: qst640403_msg0203
rows.name:
I don't wanna.
Just go yourself, Rinne.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0204
rows.name:
We would, but uh, somehow...
we're not really feeling it right now.

rows.label: qst640403_msg0205
rows.name: ...Okay, so now what?

rows.label: qst640403_msg0206
rows.name: Mgghhh...
